titles: The sick-mans couch A sermon preached before the most noble Prince Henrie at Greenewich, March 12. Ann. 1604. By Thomas Playfere professour of Diuinitie for the Ladie Margaret in Cambridge.
author: Playfere, Thomas, 1561?-1609.
date: 1605. And are to be sold in Paulschurchyard at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson. [1605]
publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,
notes: Errata on verso of H4, final leaf.
